name: Gas Guzzlers Extreme: Full Metal Frenzy
name_original: Gas Guzzlers Extreme: Full Metal Frenzy
description:
Gas Guzzlers Extreme: Full Metal Frenzy is a racing-arcade game developed by Gamepires. It was originally released in 2014. It was published by Iceberg Interactive.
Gas Guzzlers Extreme: Full Metal Frenzy is available on PC.
